item.title: Galaxy CEO: Ethereum Will Break $4,000, Outperform Bitcoin in the Next Six Months
item.description: On July 25th, Michael Novogratz, the CEO of Galaxy Digital, told CNBC that institutional interest in Ethereum is growing rapidly. This could lead to a supply shock and potentially cause Ether to outperform Bitcoin in the next six months. "ETH has a limited supply, so I think ETH may have the opportunity to outperform Bitcoin in the next three to six months."Furthermore, Michael Novogratz believes that Bitcoin will rise to $150,000.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum spot ETF saw a net inflow of $231.2 million, while the SOL spot ETF saw a net inflow of $13.4 million.
item.description: On July 25th, according to Farside Investors, the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF yesterday was $231.2 million. The net inflow of Fidelity FETH was $210 million, and the net outflow/inflow volume of BlackRock ETHA was 0.In addition, the net inflow of REX-Osprey SOL spot ETF yesterday was $13.4 million.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $2.267 billion, ending a three-day streak of net outflows.
item.description: On July 25th, according to Farside Investors, the net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF was $226.7 million yesterday, bringing an end to a three-day consecutive period of net outflows.Among them, the BlackRock IBIT witnessed a net inflow of $32.5 million, Fidelity FBTC had a net inflow of $1.066 billion, and VanEck HODL saw a net inflow of $46.4 million.

item.title: Galaxy Digital has just sent 1500 BTC to 6 new addresses in the last 10 minutes.
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham's monitoring, Galaxy Digital transferred 1500 BTC to 6 new addresses within nearly 10 minutes, with a value of approximately $176 million.In a previous report on July 18th, a Bitcoin whale from the Satoshi era transferred the final 40,192 BTC (approximately $4.83 billion) to Galaxy Digital. In the past four days, this Bitcoin OG (Original Gangster) has transferred a total of 80,201 BTC (approximately $9.6 billion) to Galaxy Digital.

item.title: Galaxy Digital has transferred 3420 bitcoins to various CEXs in the last 20 minutes
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham's monitoring, Galaxy Digital transferred approximately 3420 bitcoins to various centralized exchanges (CEXs) within nearly 20 minutes, with a value of about $3.95 billion. Additionally, it transferred 250 bitcoins to a certain unknown address.Prior to this, on July 18th, a Bitcoin whale from the Satoshi era had just transferred the final 40,192 BTC (approximately $4.83 billion) to Galaxy Digital. In the past four days, this Bitcoin original player (OG) has transferred a total of 80,201 BTC (approximately $9.6 billion) to Galaxy Digital.

item.title: Spartan Group just unstaked 5 million SYRUP and deposited it into Binance.
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham data, the Spartan Group unstaked 5 million SYRUP tokens (with an approximate value of $3.06 million) 10 minutes ago and deposited them into Binance. Before this news, Upbit will list Maple Finance (SYRUP) with trading pairs in KRW, BTC, and USDT.

item.title: A whale increased its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL during a market dip, with a total unrealized loss of over $11.14 million in the past week.
item.description: July 25th. Based on on-chain data, a whale enhanced its long positions on BTC, ETH, and SOL on Hyperliquid approximately half an hour ago. The whale boosted its Bitcoin long position by 40 times, possessing 37.64 coins, and the value of this position increased by $4,343,838.03.As of the moment of this writing, the whale holds a long position of $21.73 million in ETH, a long position of $15.156 million in Bitcoin, and a long position of $9.67 million in SOL, among other assets. Over the past week, this address has accumulated a total unrealized loss exceeding $11.14 million.

item.title: Gate is launching the TITAN CandyDrop event, where participants can share 68,729 TITAN.
item.description: July 25th. As per an official proclamation, Gate initiated the 57th CandyDrop event in conjunction with TITAN Protocol (TITAN) on July 23rd at 20:00 and it will last until July 29th at 20:00 (UTC+8). Users are able to participate in sharing a 68,729 TITAN reward pool by means of spot trading and inviting friends, with a maximum of 400 TITAN per individual.

item.title: Hyperlane (HYPER) has surged over 30% in the past 24 hours, with the coin currently ranked third in trading volume on Upbit.
item.description: On July 25th, based on market data, Hyperlane (HYPER) has seen a surge of more than 30% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.5244.It is worth noting that HYPER is particularly active on Upbit and ranked third in terms of trading volume on the platform in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Bitcoin briefly drops below $116,000
item.description: On July 25th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $116,000 and is now trading at $116,396, with a 24-hour decline of 2.25%.
